articles.description: India gain the upper hand through wonderful centuries from KL Rahul and Rishabh Pant before Josh Tongue’s devastating burst keeps England in first Test.
articles.title: England vs India: KL Rahul, Rishabh Pant and Josh Tongue set up Headingley thriller

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu praises Wimbledon for doing "an amazing job" to prevent a man who had been stalking her from buying tickets to the tournament.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu says Wimbledon did 'an amazing job' to prevent stalker from buying tickets to SW19

articles.description: Sampdoria will remain in Serie B after the league awards them a 3–0 win over Salernitana following the postponement of Sunday's second leg relegation play-off.
articles.title: Serie B: Sampdoria avoid relegation after being awarded victory over Salernitana

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions have warned Australia the Wallabies' superstars must appear for their Super Rugby sides in the tourists' pre-Test series matches.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions demand Australia release stars for tour matches

articles.description: As Tommy Fleetwood continues to wrestle with how to get over the winning line on the PGA Tour, American golf is trying to fathom how having a playing captain might work at this year's Ryder Cup, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Tommy Fleetwood's stumble gives US Ryder Cup team a Keegan Bradley-sized headache

articles.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander caps a dominant season as the Oklahoma City Thunder clinch the NBA Championship.
articles.title: NBA Finals: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander guides Oklahoma City Thunder to glory

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC local radio commentaries as Jofra Archer bowls in the County Championship for the first time in four years.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Day two - Jofra Archer to bowl on red-ball return

articles.description: BBC Sport goes behind the scenes at the coaching course which counts Thierry Henry and Mikel Arteta as graduates, and is shaping stars of the future.
articles.title: The Welsh Way: Inside the 'Harvard of coaching' of FAW Pro Licence

articles.description: Crystal Palace part-owner John Textor signs an agreement to sell Woody Johnson his stake in the club, believed to be worth close to £190m.
articles.title: Crystal Palace: John Textor to sell stake to New York Jets owner Woody Johnson

articles.description: Leeds United sign Slovenia centre-back Jaka Bijol on a five-year deal from Udinese.
articles.title: Jaka Bijol: Leeds sign Slovenia centre-back until 2030 from Udinese
